sentences.en: Conclusion: It is better effect to pelvic hematocele syndromes treated by narcosis.
sentences.cn: 结论: 麻醉治疗盆腔淤血综合征效果好.

sentences.en: Deep - sea divers can suffer nitrogen narcosis from breathing air under high pressure.
sentences.cn: 深海潜水者会因在高压下呼吸而出现氮麻醉.

sentences.en: Environmental considerations such as exceeding planned depth, encountering currents, cold exposure, entanglements, and narcosis.
sentences.cn: 环境考虑，如超出预定深度，遭遇水流，冷暴露，纠缠和昏迷状态。

sentences.en: Method: use the narcosis to cure pelvic hematocele syndromes 54 cases.
sentences.cn: 方法: 对54例盆腔淤血综合征的患者采用麻醉的方法治疗.

sentences.en: Objective To watch the narcosis effect of Primacaine in the oral cavity diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 目的观察碧兰麻在口腔诊疗中的麻醉效果.

sentences.en: Patient faint shows narcosis , high fever, convulsions, the skin cadaverous or the purple that show blueness.
sentences.cn: 病人昏倒呈昏迷状态，高烧，惊厥，皮肤苍白或呈青紫色。

sentences.en: Purpose: Observe the clinical effect of pelvic hematocele syndromes by the narcosis therapy.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察麻醉治疗盆腔淤血综合征临床效果.

words.tran_cn: 麻醉的；有麻醉作用的；催眠的
[药] 麻醉药；镇静剂；起麻醉作用的事物

trans.tran_en: unconsciousness induced by narcotics or general anaesthetics
